1.text: And the LORD spoke to Moses, saying,

2.text: Command the children of Israel, and say to them, My offering, and my bread for my sacrifices made by fire, for a sweet smell to me, shall you observe to offer to me in their due season.

3.text: And you shall say to them, This is the offering made by fire which you shall offer to the LORD; two lambs of the first year without spot day by day, for a continual burnt offering.

4.text: The one lamb shall you offer in the morning, and the other lamb shall you offer at even;

5.text: And a tenth part of an ephah of flour for a meat offering, mingled with the fourth part of an hin of beaten oil.

6.text: It is a continual burnt offering, which was ordained in mount Sinai for a sweet smell, a sacrifice made by fire to the LORD.

7.text: And the drink offering thereof shall be the fourth part of an hin for the one lamb: in the holy place shall you cause the strong wine to be poured to the LORD for a drink offering.

8.text: And the other lamb shall you offer at even: as the meat offering of the morning, and as the drink offering thereof, you shall offer it, a sacrifice made by fire, of a sweet smell to the LORD.

9.text: And on the sabbath day two lambs of the first year without spot, and two tenth deals of flour for a meat offering, mingled with oil, and the drink offering thereof:

10.text: This is the burnt offering of every sabbath, beside the continual burnt offering, and his drink offering.

11.text: And in the beginnings of your months you shall offer a burnt offering to the LORD; two young bullocks, and one ram, seven lambs of the first year without spot;

12.text: And three tenth deals of flour for a meat offering, mingled with oil, for one bullock; and two tenth deals of flour for a meat offering, mingled with oil, for one ram;

13.text: And a several tenth deal of flour mingled with oil for a meat offering to one lamb; for a burnt offering of a sweet smell, a sacrifice made by fire to the LORD.

14.text: And their drink offerings shall be half an hin of wine to a bullock, and the third part of an hin to a ram, and a fourth part of an hin to a lamb: this is the burnt offering of every month throughout the months of the year.

15.text: And one kid of the goats for a sin offering to the LORD shall be offered, beside the continual burnt offering, and his drink offering.

16.text: And in the fourteenth day of the first month is the passover of the LORD.

17.text: And in the fifteenth day of this month is the feast: seven days shall unleavened bread be eaten.

18.text: In the first day shall be an holy convocation; you shall do no manner of servile work therein:

19.text: But you shall offer a sacrifice made by fire for a burnt offering to the LORD; two young bullocks, and one ram, and seven lambs of the first year: they shall be to you without blemish:

20.text: And their meat offering shall be of flour mingled with oil: three tenth deals shall you offer for a bullock, and two tenth deals for a ram;

21.text: A several tenth deal shall you offer for every lamb, throughout the seven lambs:

22.text: And one goat for a sin offering, to make an atonement for you.

23.text: You shall offer these beside the burnt offering in the morning, which is for a continual burnt offering.

24.text: After this manner you shall offer daily, throughout the seven days, the meat of the sacrifice made by fire, of a sweet smell to the LORD: it shall be offered beside the continual burnt offering, and his drink offering.

25.text: And on the seventh day you shall have an holy convocation; you shall do no servile work.

26.text: Also in the day of the first fruits, when you bring a new meat offering to the LORD, after your weeks be out, you shall have an holy convocation; you shall do no servile work:

27.text: But you shall offer the burnt offering for a sweet smell to the LORD; two young bullocks, one ram, seven lambs of the first year;

28.text: And their meat offering of flour mingled with oil, three tenth deals to one bullock, two tenth deals to one ram,

29.text: A several tenth deal to one lamb, throughout the seven lambs;

30.text: And one kid of the goats, to make an atonement for you.

31.text: You shall offer them beside the continual burnt offering, and his meat offering, (they shall be to you without blemish) and their drink offerings.
